story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_0100_10: I see. So Chairman Rose said all that...
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_0200_10: I hope he doesn’t try to use force again...
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Oh, I guess I should tell the two of you
about him...
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
In the past, Chairman Rose caused the Darkest Day
to happen again in Galar.
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Yeah, he awakened Eternatus and tried to use its
energy to solve Galar’s problems.
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Yeah, Eternatus caused that incident in which
Dynamax Pokémon were rampaging on Pasio.
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_1000_10:
The exact same thing happened in Galar. Dynamax
Pokémon went on a rampage and caused a lot of
damage...
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_1100_10:
As a result, the Chairman Rose we know took
responsibility by turning himself over to the police.
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_1200_10:
But the Chairman Rose that’s here now doesn’t
seem to remember any of it...
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I see. That’s why you’re worried he might do the
same thing again.
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_1500_10:
that we share the same desire to create a
brighter future for Galar and the world.
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I don’t want us to repeat the same tragedy by
working at cross-purposes.
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Even if Chairman Rose does try something, I don’t
think he’ll be able to do anything impactful.
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_1800_10:
He’s only just come to Pasio, so I don’t think he
has the unique facilities he’d need for
his research...
story_galar_01_06000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Above all, I’ve been managing my sync stone
research data with extra care, since Giovanni has
been coming after it.
